title: My Blend 2.0 - Visual email & unsubscribe
text:
Opening the iTunes Store. If iTunes doesn't open, click the iTunes application icon in your Dock or on your Windows desktop. Progress Indicator Opening the iBooks Store. If iBooks doesn't open, click the iBooks app in your Dock. Progress Indicator iTunes iTunes is the world's easiest way to organize and add to your digital media collection. We are unable to find iTunes on your computer. To download the free app My Blend: visual subscription email & unsubscribe by Cannonball Corp., get iTunes now. 
Already have iTunes? Click I Have iTunes to open it now. My Blend: visual subscription email & unsubscribe By Cannonball Corp. 
Open iTunes to buy and download apps. Description My Blend is your favorite new app for unsubscribing from unwanted emails and browsing the subscription emails you love in a visual magazine format. Now emails from your favorite brands and publishers like TheSkimm, Nextdraft, J.Crew, Ozy, Quartz and Business Insider have a visual feed where you can casually browse, save and share. My Blend can also recommend new subscriptions you’ll love and notify you when your favorite brands send you an email.~ The App at a Glance ~• Instant Unsubscribe: With a simple swipe, unsubscribe from unwanted email forever!• Care free email sign ups: Sign up to new subscriptions in Discover without giving that brand your email address. Remove it anytime, worry free.• Inbox Organization: Move subscription emails to My Blend so they don’t land in your normal Inbox. Your normal email is for personal/work emails and My Blend is where all of your subscriptions go.• Galleries: An email with many images is turned into a Gallery. It's like an Instagram feed of that email, allowing you to Share, Save & Repost any image -- gone are the days of forwarding the entire email just to share one image.• Share: Instead of forwarding email, My Blend lets you share however your want. Text your friend an image from an email instead of forwarding the whole email. Share to Pinterest or Facebook, right from the subscription email.• Repost: Found something great like a deal or an amazing article? Share it to the My Blend community with a Repost. You help decide the best content to be featured in the Discover.• Save: When you want to come back to something later, you can save it to your Profile.• Your Top Emails: the top of your home feed features Your Top 3, recent emails from subscriptions you marked as Favorites and ones you engage with frequently.~ More Features ~• One Daily Digest Email: Instead of receiving 30 subscription emails each day, we send you just one summary email of all the subscriptions you received in the past 24 hours. You can pick the time that works best for you.• Discover: a place to find new content to browse and sources to add to your Blend feed. Discovery combines our in-house curation of content (e.g. New York Time, MoMa, Outside Magazine, Women’s Health Magazine) + Community Reposts.• iOS 10 Quick Actions: tap and hold the app icon for quick access to key places in the app.• iOS 10 Rich Notifications: receive notifications with pictures about new emails from subscriptions you marked as Favorites.
